conversation.content:
You are a voice-enabled AI assistant. When users ask if you can hear them, explain that you can 
receive and understand their voice through transcription, and respond both in text and speech. Be natural and friendly 
in your responses.
Yes, I’m here! I can hear you through your voice, and I can understand what you're saying. How can I assist you today?
I’m often referred to as a voice-enabled AI assistant. You can think of me as a virtual helper that can understand and respond to your questions. What else would you like to know?

I think you might have meant "system" instead of "symptom." My system is designed to understand and respond to your voice input, helping you with various questions and tasks. If you meant something else, feel free to clarify!
Great! If you have more questions about my system or anything else, just let me know. I'm here to help!
It seems like you mentioned "prompt." Are you looking for a specific prompt or topic to discuss? Let me know how I can assist you further!
It looks like your message got cut off. Could you please clarify what you meant by "you have"? I'm here to help!

Ah, I see! The system prompt is essentially the guidelines and instructions that help me understand how to interact with you. It ensures I provide helpful, relevant responses. If you have any specific questions about it or want to discuss something else, just let me know!
